heroArea.paragraph: If you're looking to learn programming, web development, mobile app development, and excel in the field to prepare for the job market in a way that you can make real money, you're in the right place.

aboutArea.title: Many will teach you programming, but who will prepare you for the job market?
aboutArea.paragraph: Information is everywhere, but the market demands something else... So the right question is, where is the place that will prepare me to work and earn from what I have learned?

featuresArea.paragraphOne: Since you're still scrolling, it means the message resonated with you and you're eager to work in this field...
featuresArea.paragraphTwo: Let me tell you what you'll gain by learning programming at ITLegend:

videoArea.title: is the accumulation of many right steps

freeDeplomaArea.title: I offer a free diploma that teaches you the basics of programming
freeDeplomaArea.paragraph: We offer you a unique opportunity to gain a free diploma that will give you a strong foundation in programming basics. Whether you're a beginner or looking to enhance your skills, this diploma is specially designed to equip you with practical knowledge and the necessary tools to enter the programming world. Join now and take advantage of this special offer that will open new doors in the field of technology and programming!
freeDeplomaArea.featureTwo: Will Set a Strong Foundation in Programming
freeDeplomaArea.featureThree: No Prior Knowledge Required, Just Start Immediately
